data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 9,715 believers in Xaignabouri and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Xaignabouri, Laos

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Xaignabouri, Laos.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Xaignabouri, Laos. Please, stir the 9,715 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Xaignabouri, Laos know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Kuan, Khuen people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Xaignabouri, Laos.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Xaignabouri, Laos.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.section_summary:
the state of Xaignabouri, Laos has a population of 382,200.

We estimate Xaignabouri has 9,715 people who might know Jesus, 4,708 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 367,777 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 39 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Xaignabouri, Laos will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.

location.name: Xaignabouri
location.people_groups_list: Arem, Cham, Western, Chut, Katang, Northern, Aheu Luang
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arem (800), Cham, Western (600), Chut (400), Katang, Northern (68,000), Aheu Luang (600)
